publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-307 Robert Brown: HM Inspectorate of Education Report on Children Detained at Dungavel Immigration Removal Centre-That the Parliament notes the report by HM Inspectorate of Education on the education provision for children detained at Dungavel Immigration Removal Centre; notes that 79 children were held for periods in excess of two weeks and 36 children in excess of six weeks over the period of the report; further notes the report's conclusion that the education provision made at the centre was only acceptable for children detained for up to two weeks and unsatisfactory for those detained more than six weeks, and urges Her Majesty's Government to take immediate action on the report and in particular to end the compulsory detention of children at Dungavel. Supported by: Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mark Ballard*, Fiona Hyslop*, John Swinburne*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
